About.description: I am a mechatronics engineer with knowledge and 1.5 years of experience in web programming as a frontend developer. My technical experience combined with analytical and problem-solving skills allows me to approach projects from a multidisciplinary perspective. My experience in developing mechatronics projects has given me the ability to work in a team and lead projects. Additionally, my experience in web programming allows me to develop innovative solutions and web applications for a wide variety of projects. I am excited to apply my skills and experience to a challenging position in an innovative company.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.hello: Hey you! What are you waiting for to tell me about your project? Cheer up and send me a message, I'm eager to learn more about what you've been working on!
Contact.name: Name

0.title: CUSTOMER MANAGER
0.description: Application to keep track of customer information in a business

1.title: OBJECT DETECTION WITH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
1.description: Real-time object detection by training a convolutional neural network, this project was trained to differentiate between 2 different objects

2.title: GESTURE CONTROLLED VOLUME
2.description: Control the volume of a computer using hand gestures using computer vision

3.title: POSE ESTIMATOR
3.description: Extracts pose information of a person within a video, this can be useful for character animations or IOT applications

4.title: WEATHER STATE SEARCH BY CITY
4.description: Implementation of fetchApi to give information about the weather
4.tecnologies: Technologies used: Sass, JavaScript, HTML, Axios

5.title: INSURANCE QUOTE
5.description: This page makes a budget for the hiring of an insurance depending on various parameters
5.tecnologies: Technologies used: Sass, JavaScript, HTML, React

6.title: SHOPPING CART PROJECT
6.description: Management of a shopping cart where you can add, edit and delete products

7.title: ONLINE STORE
7.description: Online store for a 3D printing business
7.tecnologies: Technologies used: Sass, JavaScript, HTML, Bootstrap

8.title: WEBSITE DESIGN
8.description: Web design for a furniture store

9.title: RICK AND MORTY
9.description: This project is a web application that shows information about the characters from the popular TV show Rick and Morty, using the Rick and Morty public API. The application is built with React for the frontend and Express for the backend, using MongoDB to store user information and their favorites.
9.tecnologies: Technologies used: Node, Express, React, JavaScript, Axios, Bootstrap, CSS, MongoDB

10.title: POKEMON
10.description: The application displays a list of Pokemon characters, along with their names, images, and some of their characteristics such as their Pokemon type, abilities, and statistics. The user can click on each character to get more details such as a detailed description of their abilities and statistics.
10.tecnologies: Technologies used: React, JavaScript, Axios, Bootstrap, CSS, HTML

11.title: ADMINISTRATIVE SOFTWARE
11.description: The program is a desktop application built in Electron that allows users to keep detailed records of clients, income and expenses for a business. Additionally, the program features an agenda, calendar, and reminders to help users stay organized and on top of important appointments and tasks.
11.tecnologies: Technologies used: Electron, JavaScript, Axios, Bootstrap, CSS, HTML

12.title: 3D PRINTER
12.description: The project involves building a 3D printer from scratch, including designing and purchasing materials. The 3D printer is a tool that allows users to create three-dimensional objects from a digital file. Building the 3D printer involved purchasing materials, constructing the structure and electronics, as well as calibrating and fine-tuning the printer.
12.tecnologies: Technologies used: Mechanics, Programming, Electronics, Automation, Control

13.title: AUTOMATED BAR
13.description: The project involves building a machine that prepares drinks automatically and has an Android application with the drink menu for a bar. The machine is capable of mixing several liquor bottles and other ingredients in different portions to prepare the desired drink.
13.tecnologies: Technologies used: React, C++, Electronics, Automation, Control

14.title: ROBOTIC ARM
14.description: This project consists of a 3D-printed robotic arm designed in Solidworks. It operates with stepper motors and has been programmed in C++, allowing it to perform precise and controlled movements. With this robotic arm, you can perform a wide variety of tasks, from manipulating objects to carrying out more complex operations in industrial environments. Its sleek and modern design, combined with its high precision and control, make it an essential tool for any robotics enthusiast.
14.tecnologies: Technologies used: React, C++, Electronics, Automation, Control
